Gresham.Fairview, Oregon:
Fairview is a city in Multnomah County, Oregon, United States. As of the 2010 census, the city population was 8,920.


== History ==
Members of the Multnomah tribe of Chinookan Indians lived in a village near the Columbia River and the future site of Fairview when the Lewis and Clark Expedition visited the area in 1806.
